tasks.name: Prepare your CV
tasks.description: Please get your CV ready for the upcoming job applications

tasks.name: File taxes for the year 2018
tasks.description: Please prepare all your tax documents.

tasks.name: Apply for tax deadline extension
tasks.description: There are only 3 days left for your tax filing. Please apply for a deadline extension.

comments.comment: Please review the education section in your CV. It is missing your high school grades.
comments.author: Hugo B.

messages.message: Hello. I have tried calling you a few times during the last week. Please get in touch with me to discuss your next job interview on Tuesday.
messages.author: Hugo B

messages.message: My cat died and I was busy.
messages.author: Harry H.

messages.message: OK. Let me know if you want to talk about it.
messages.author: Hugo B.
